snippet: The actress Megan Hilty is taking on a role made famous by Marilyn Monroe, the celebrity her character on NBC’s “Smash” pines to play, in “Gentlemen Prefer Blondes,” part of the Encores! series at City Center.
abstract: Megan Hilty, who stars in the NBC series Smash as an actress hoping to portray Marilyn Monroe in a Broadway show, is also rehearsing for the Encores! production of the musical Gentlemen Prefer Blondes, in which she plays the role originally made famous by Monroe.
lead_paragraph: The actress Megan Hilty is taking on a role made famous by Marilyn Monroe, the celebrity her character on NBC’s “Smash” pines to play, in “Gentlemen Prefer Blondes,” part of the Encores! series at City Center.

headline.seo: Megan Hilty in ‘Gentlemen Prefer Blondes’ and ‘Smash’
headline.main: An Actor’s Best Friend: A Gem of a Role (or 2)
headline.print_headline: An Actor’s Best Friend: A Gem of a Role (or 2)
